Title: Awake in the middle of the night
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Political study during the night was propagated and gave people the opportunity to earn praise and certificates.The books on the windowsill are publications by Mao, Marx and Engels, Lenin. On the walls are five awards and a poster from the Revolutionary Opera The Azalea Mountain (杜鹃山). Outside, through the window, a wall poster with a slogan against Lin Biao and Confucius.
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
